text: <@U02688JHZ> the design they sent over for the error state is going to have to be changed so that it works on smaller screens
it’s the same issues as the onboarding where the type is going to have to be made smaller
also, Phillip mentioned before that it would be a good idea to have some sort of refresh button on that screen and I agree. He saw something like it on one of the Material design pages.
LMK when you see this
<@U02688JHZ> also noticing that this design does not consider landscape mode which is supported throughout the app
<@U0261PCRQ>, I chatted with phillip and those changes sound find to me
<@U02AUNA0P>: can you provide a landscape version with the assets/PSD you have?
<@U02688JHZ>, yeah i think so. i can get a start on that design right now
